ideas.title: Multi-Platform Sell-Through
ideas.description: Create a unified view that calculates 'True Sell-Through' by combining views/downloads from Thangs with actual sales on Etsy to verify which designs translate to physical demand.

ideas.title: Customer Sentiment AI
ideas.description: Scrape Etsy reviews and Thangs comments weekly. Use Gemini/Claude to summarize 'Feature Requests' and 'Common Complaints' for product iteration.

ideas.title: Auto-Gallery Update
ideas.description: When a new 'Make' is posted on Thangs or a photo review on Etsy, automatically save the image to a 'Social Proof' folder for Instagram reposting.

ideas.title: Weekly SKU Profitability Snapshot
ideas.description: Automatically pull last 7 days of Etsy orders, subtract estimated material + shipping costs per SKU, and post a ranked list of top and bottom performers so pricing and product focus can be adjusted quickly.

ideas.title: Out-of-Stock Risk Alert
ideas.description: Each evening, estimate filament and packaging burn-rate from recent order volume and send an alert when any key material is projected to run out within 7 days.

ideas.title: Listing Underperformer Nudge
ideas.description: Every Monday, flag Etsy listings with high views but low conversion over the last 14 days and generate one suggested tweak (title, thumbnail, or price) to test this week.

ideas.title: Repeat Buyer Thank-You Trigger
ideas.description: Automatically detect repeat customers and draft a personalized thank-you message with a small coupon code, ready for one-click send after each qualifying order.

ideas.title: Refund Spike Detector
ideas.description: Run a daily check on Etsy cancellations and refunds; if any SKU exceeds a 7-day refund-rate threshold, send an alert with the top likely causes from recent customer messages so issues can be fixed before momentum drops.

ideas.title: Fast-Mover Reprint Queue
ideas.description: Each morning, identify SKUs with accelerating sales velocity and auto-generate a prioritized print queue with suggested quantities based on the last 14 days to reduce stockouts and idle printer time.

ideas.title: Delivery Delay Early Warning
ideas.description: Check open Etsy orders twice daily against promised dispatch windows and flag any order likely to miss ship-by date in the next 24 hours, with a suggested customer update template to prevent late-shipment penalties.

ideas.title: Bundle Opportunity Finder
ideas.description: Weekly, detect product pairs that are frequently bought by the same customer within 30 days and suggest 1-2 bundle listings with target bundle price and expected margin uplift.

ideas.title: Abandoned Cart Recovery Drafts
ideas.description: Every 6 hours, pull Etsy abandoned-cart events (where available) and auto-draft short recovery messages or offer snippets for high-intent shoppers, sorted by estimated order value.

ideas.title: Print Failure Pattern Tracker
ideas.description: Log failed prints by SKU, material, and printer, then send a weekly report highlighting repeat failure patterns and the top setup changes to test to reduce wasted filament and machine time.

ideas.title: Late Reply Risk Monitor
ideas.description: Scan Etsy messages every hour and alert when any buyer thread is within 6 hours of Etsy's 24-hour response target, with a one-paragraph draft reply to protect Star Seller metrics.

ideas.title: Price Change Impact Tracker
ideas.description: When a listing price is changed, automatically track 14-day before/after conversion and revenue per visitor, then post a simple verdict (improved, neutral, worse) to guide future pricing decisions.

ideas.title: Social Trend Momentum Alerts
ideas.description: Weekly, scan Twitter/TikTok for Stray Kids-related hashtag spikes and suggest one limited-time print accessory or modification (e.g., concert-specific charms) to capture short-term hype windows.

ideas.title: Packaging Weight Optimizer
ideas.description: Cross-reference actual shipping weights of delivered orders with postage classes and flag SKUs where a minor design or packaging change (e.g., 5g reduction) could drop the item into a cheaper shipping tier.

ideas.title: Competitor Badge Migration Tracker
ideas.description: Monitor when a competitor's item gains or loses an Etsy 'Bestseller' or 'Popular Now' badge and notify if a price change or listing update by that shop preceded the badge shift.
